column5: I plan to fish Walleye on the English River near Grassy Narrows, more specifically the Ball Lake vacinity, this summer. Any advice you can give would be appreciated. Any good places near, to hook into a few snakes as well, a couple of hours of fighting with them is always a great time?This message may seem a little premature. But the winter weather is making me think of warm summer days and fishing, fishing and more fishing.
